message:
Tensions escalates at Shahbagh as Hifazat men and Shahbagh protesters in chase and counter-chase; sounds of sporadic gunshots also heard

A group lead by Chatro League president attacked the Hifazat men while returning from Shapla Chatar after long-march near Ramna Park and Sharwardi Uddan area with rods, Chapati, sharp knifes. 

At the same time supporters on 'Gono Jagoron Monch' also joined the Chatro League gong.
